title: Lab Test
detail: All kind of lab test can be done from this hospital. You will get 25% discount on every lab test everytime you want to test some testing. Our hospital provides the best lab tests.

title: Dental Care
detail: Dental Care is one of the sensitive department which is handled by the very proffesional doctors of ours.

title: Cardiac Monitoring
detail: Patients with Cardiac Deaseas will get extra care because our hospital was first established to help only the cardiatic patients.

title: Outdoor Checkup
detail: Shafa Care Provides OutDoor Checkups for everyone ,anywhere in the Dhaka City

title: Emergency Care
detail: We offer Emergency Care for all of our patients. We have more than 300 ICU beds in the hospital whch all are capable of high care systems

title: Blood Test
detail: Anyonecan test their blood group and other blood test accurately in the hospital at a resonable fees

title: Therapeutic Services
detail: There are also several therapies provided by our proffesional therapists.

title: CCU Services
detail: A CCU can also refer to a cardiac care unit, which is a specialized unit for patients with heart-related problems.

title: Covid 19 Unit
detail: For the pandemic Covid 19, our hospital have separate unit for the Covid 19.There are total 200 ICU dedicated for only covid 19.
